input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset

Item features:
This Hot Wheels set makes bathtime a splash
Suction cups attach the playset to the tub
Load the vehicle on the ramp and fill the cup with water
Tip the cup and watch the car go down the ramp, through the flames and into the tub
Includes playset and 1 vehicle

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset brings the thrills of the track into the tub!  Suction cups attach the playset to your tub, and you can load the vehicle on the ramp and fill the cup with water to watch it go down the ramp, through the flames, and into the tub! This fun set includes the playset and one vehicle.  It's perfect for bathtime fun!
input_text.Response B: Your child will love playing with the Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset. The tub playset is a great way to make the most out of bathtime. With the set's suction cups, you can attach it to the side of the tub and let your child play with the vehicle. Fill the cup with water and let your child tip it over to watch the car go down the ramp and through the flames. Your child can also use the playset to simply play in the water. This playset is a great tool for developing hand-eye coordination and stimulating your child's imagination. Buy it today and watch your child have a blast!
